short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a ailaan message to a specified page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses a WordPress plugin to provide an API that can be used to display a message on any page of your liking with appropriate dynamically injected CSS and DOM location.
